data.title: WIOA
data.meta_description: East Central Georgia Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA) assists students with tuition, books, uniforms and transportation.
data.text:
East Central Georgia Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act provides exceptional career services and resource information to individuals who are in need of Career Planning, Career Development, and Career Placement. This program assists students with tuition, books, uniforms and transportation.

Eligibility Requirements

Services Offered

Workshops – given to raise awareness on certain issues

Resume Writing/Preparation – includes cover letter, resume, and references

Supportive Services – assist with transportation & childcare to qualified applicants

Job Search Assistance– internet job search, provide job availability information

Occupational Skills Training – assist with training needs while in school

One-on-one Career Advisement – assist with career planning, development, & placement

Helpful Resources– information given based on individuals needs and requests.

WorkKeys Assessment – measures work skills for a variety of occupations.

KeyTrain Assessment – a self paced pre-post assessment used to improve basic skills measured by WorkKeys.

Click on the tab below for your region and county of residence to see WIOA locations and contact information:
